scripts.build: npm i && concurrently 'npm run build:shared' 'npm run build:api' 'npm run build:web'
scripts.build:prod: npm ci && concurrently 'cd app/api && npm run build:prod' 'cd app/web && npm run build:prod'
scripts.dev: npm i --no-audit && concurrently -k -n shared,api,web 'npm run dev:shared' 'npm run dev:api' 'npm run dev:web'
scripts.lint: npm i --no-audit && concurrently -k -n shared,api,web 'npm run lint:shared' 'npm run lint:api' 'npm run lint:web'
scripts.migrate: npm run tunnel & tunnel=$!; trap "kill $tunnel" EXIT INT TERM; cd app/api && npm i && npm run migrate
scripts.prepare: concurrently -n shared,api,web 'cd app/shared && npm i --no-audit' 'cd app/api && npm i --no-audit' 'cd app/web && npm i --no-audit'
